Lev Parnas Releases Explosive Memoir, SHADOW DIPLOMACY, Exposing Trump's Covert Direction

In a highly anticipated Black Friday book launch, Lev Parnas, a reformed former Trump insider, has released his biographical memoir, Shadow Diplomacy: Lev Parnas and his Wild Ride from the Streets of Brooklyn to Trump's Inner Circle. The book offers readers an unprecedented insider's perspective into the murky world of international politics under Donald Trump's covert direction.

Shadow Diplomacy delves into Parnas' firsthand experiences, shedding light on the secret maneuvers and clandestine negotiations that shaped the global geopolitical landscape during his years of international travel to Ukraine, Turkey, Spain, Israel, Austria, France, the UK, and Poland. As a key figure with unique access to corridors of power who acted as a shadow presidential envoy, Parnas provides readers with a compelling narrative.

The book's timeline spans his involvement in critical diplomatic efforts, including his conversation with Venezuelan President Nicolas Maduro alongside Rudy Giuliani, to his solo discussions with two Ukrainian presidents, and his former political allegiance with an obscure Florida congressman who later became the state's controversial governor due to their friendship.

With an unlikely path into politics that led him to intersect with pivotal historical moments, Parnas offers an unfiltered account of the shadowy undercurrents that influence international relations. The memoir reveals untold stories, shedding light on the intricate dance between political figures, governments, and behind-the-scenes operators, including the story behind the facts that led to ex-President Donald Trump's first impeachment trial.

Shadow Diplomacy is set to impact political news as the House Republican caucus continues an impeachment inquiry into President Joe Biden over his son, Hunter Biden, which Parnas' book proves is unfounded. In a statement, Lev Parnas remarked, "I'm thrilled to share my experiences with readers in Shadow Diplomacy. Never did I expect to land in the middle of our country's international affairs alongside America's mayor and a wealthy, powerful New York real estate developer who became President of the United States."

Pre-sales for Shadow Diplomacy began on Black Friday, November 24, 2023, allowing readers to secure copies before the official release date. The book will be available through major retailers, online platforms, and independent bookstores.

Parnas' memoir is a must-read for anyone interested in understanding the inner workings of international politics and the Trump administration's covert operations. With its explosive revelations and insider perspective, Shadow Diplomacy is set to make waves in the political landscape.

Buy book on Amazon https://www.amazon.com/Shadow-Diplomacy-Parnas-Brooklyn-Trumps/dp/B0CVR6LFHX

News Nov 28, 2023
